summary: Disowned by his parents at a young age, a man ends up in a small village controlled by underworld dons and some very powerful politicians. Lazy, alcoholic and unemployed, he gets influenced by a journalist with a positive mission.
cast: Nana Patekar|Dimple Kapadia|Atul Agnihotri|Mamta Kulkarni|Farida Jalal|Paresh Rawal|Tinnu Anand|Mushtaq Khan|Ishrat Ali|Danny Denzongpa|Bindu|Shafi Inamdar|Girish Malik|Mahesh Anand|Sujit Kumar|Ram Mohan|Vikas Anand|Janardhan Parab|Ghanshyam Nayak|Viju Khote|Babbanlal Yadav|Raj Dutt|Asha Sharma|Maheshwari|K.K. Raj|Zubair Khan|Arun Mathur|Devendra Pandit|Mahesh Bhatt|Manmauji|Jahan Bloch|Yasmin|Ismail|Ankush Mohite|Narendra Goswami|Shashi Puri|Hussain Bloch|Samir Rajda|Master Khurshid|Mukesh Rawal|Tej Sapru|Master Atit|Master Sunny
title: Krantiveer
